title: Hidden Through Time 2: Console Magic Awaits | Adventure Gamers
text: Hidden Through Time 2: Console Magic Awaits Prepare to embark on a journey through whimsical worlds and enchanting realms as Rogueside announces the much-anticipated console release of Hidden Through Time 2: Myths & Magic. Initially launched on PC, the captivating hidden-object adventure is set to extend its magic to Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X|S, and PlayStation 5 from January 25th, priced at $12.49. The first game in the series had over 350,000 players joyfully searching for cleverly hidden items. The sequel invites fans of puzzle games and those seeking a family-friendly experience to unlock the secrets of history and myth. Check out the console release trailer here: Hidden Through Time 2: Myths & Magic elevates the beloved concept of 2D hidden object puzzles to new dimensions. Players will immerse themselves in beautifully illustrated, hand-drawn worlds, each brimming with secrets waiting to be discovered. The game will be available on [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2304640/Hidden_Through_Time_2_Myths__Magic/) from January 25th. Get ready to whip out your digital magnifying glass and uncover the enchanting worlds of Hidden Through Time 2: Myths & Magic.
